solution_line_template: When Samantha paid ${monthly_installment_amount} in {num_installments} equal monthly installments, she paid a total of $<<{monthly_installment_amount}*{num_installments}={total_installments_paid}>>{total_installments_paid}

Since the higher purchase is a deposit plus the total monthly installments, Samatha paid ${deposit_amount}+${total_installments_paid}=$<<{deposit_amount}+{total_installments_paid}={total_higher_purchase_price}>>{total_higher_purchase_price} for the refrigerator on higher purchase.

If she would have bought the refrigerator on the cash prize, Samantha would have paid ${total_higher_purchase_price}- to ${cash_price}= $<<{total_higher_purchase_price}-{cash_price}={money_saved}>>{money_saved} less.
